name: Humpi and Hemicube
description:
Step into a mind-bending world where gravity dances to your tune! In this 3d puzzle adventure, you'll navigate through a mesmerizing realm where every object possesses its own gravitational pull. Twist, teleport and turn your way through gravity-defying challenges that'll test your wits and spatial reasoning. It's like sokoban met a zero-g playground, offering a fresh twist as you walk on walls, manipulate gravity and teleport your way to triumph. Get ready to shift your perspective and embrace a gravity all your own!



it's monument valley meets sokoban If you like any of this game, you will definitely like this one.

Features:


⩥ Wall walking
⩥ Teleports
⩥ Elevators
⩥ NPC's (it moves when you move)


Push boxes and make your way through these mind-bending levels. But be careful where you push those box, sometime there will be no way to push them again. So think like a mastermind and find the solution.



Portals are great; we all love them, but what will happen if you're stuck in an endless loop? Play and find out for yourself. Just remember to think outside the box, and solutions will come to you.
